seed_pack.name: Xyence Engineering Conventions
seed_pack.description: Optional namespace-scoped conventions for Xyence engineering teams.

payload.name: xyence-engineering-conventions
payload.content_markdown:
# Xyence Engineering Conventions

- Preserve governance lifecycle semantics in naming and UI copy.
- Keep code changes scoped and reversible.
- Prefer deterministic identifiers and explicit versioning metadata.
- Avoid embedding environment-specific secrets or values in artifacts.
